name: Windows
description: Run windows in docker...because why not?
short_desc: Full windows vm in your browser
author: dockurr

form_fields.label: RAM
form_fields.hint: RAM to asign in the VM (in gigabytes)

form_fields.label: CPU Cores
form_fields.hint: CPU cores to asign in the VM

form_fields.label: Disk Size
form_fields.hint: Disk size for the VM, it will be used dynamically (in gigabytes)

form_fields.label: Windows Version
form_fields.hint: The windows version to use, see the description for available versions
